home.title: Home
home.description: Hi, I am Julio, a front-end developer from Curitiba, Brazil. I write code and also write/speak about technology.

me.title: jlozovei
me.1st: My name is Julio Lozovei, aka [em]jlozovei[/em]. Nice to meet you!
me.2nd: I'm a front-end developer who lives and works in Curitiba, Brazil. I started to write HTML when was 15; beyond coding, I also love sports and music - I play guitar, bass and ukulele, but just as a hobby.
me.3rd: Beyond CSS and JavaScript, I also speaks Portuguese (native), English (advanced) and Spanish (almost advanced). I'm into web and mobile development, ux/ui, a bit of back-end and embedded system as well.
me.4th: I'm [myAge], write and speak about technology, career and development culture. You can find my texts in those links below:

labs.title: Labs
labs.description: Here are some of my recent works. Take a look, and if you feel in your heart, contribute - it's open source!

404.title: 404 - Signal Lost
404.description: Check your cables, your internet connection, or try one of those links below; maybe they'll work:

social.twitter: See my random bullshit at Twitter
social.dev: Read my texts on The Practical Dev
